backup.description: '%(backup)s' is expanded to partition's ZODB backup path (typically 'srv/backup/zodb'), and %(name)s with the export id

family.description: Opaque name used to regroup/separate mountpoints under different ZEO processes (must be valid as a file name and as a ConfigParser section name)

path.description: FileStorage file path, '%(zodb)s' occurrences are replaced with the path to partition's srv/zodb directory, and %(name)s with the export id
